title: Textile, "115/3", 1951
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: screen printed on plain weave, glazed
inscribed: Cheney Brothers Dandelion (printed in right selvedge); Vat Colors (printed in left selvedge)
description: Design in broad impressionistic brush-strokes of horizontal rows of life-sized seeding dandelions  against a grassy ground, printed in black, grays, and tan on a white ground.
